hibernate-mapping.query:
from com.ibm.ea.sigbank.SoftwareLpar l
left join fetch l.softwareLparEff
where l.id = :id
order by l.name

from MsHardwareBaseline m
join fetch m.customer join fetch m.customer.pod join fetch m.customer.industry join fetch m.customer.industry.sector join fetch m.customer.customerType left join fetch m.customer.misldAccountSettings left join fetch m.customer.misldAccountSettings.licenseAgreementType
where m.customer.pod.podName = :podName

from com.ibm.ea.sigbank.SoftwareLpar l
where l.customer = :customer and l.name = :name

select m.customer.pod.podName, m.customer.industry.industryName, m.customer.industry.sector.sectorName,m.customer.customerType.customerTypeName, m.customer.accountNumber, m.customer.customerName, m.nodeName, m.serialNumber, m.machineType, m.machineModel, m.country, m.status
from MsHardwareBaseline as m, MsHardwareBaseline as mh
where m.nodeName = mh.nodeName
group by m.customer.pod.podName, m.customer.industry.industryName, m.customer.industry.sector.sectorName,m.customer.customerType.customerTypeName, m.customer.accountNumber, m.customer.customerName, m.nodeName, m.serialNumber, m.machineType, m.machineModel, m.country, m.status
having count(m.nodeName) > 1

select m.customer.pod.podName, m.customer.industry.industryName, m.customer.industry.sector.sectorName,m.customer.customerType.customerTypeName, m.customer.accountNumber, m.customer.customerName, m.nodeName, m.serialNumber, m.machineType, m.machineModel, m.country, m.status
from MsHardwareBaseline as m, MsHardwareBaseline as mh
where LENGTH(mh.nodeName) >= LENGTH(m.nodeName) and m.nodeName = SUBSTR(mh.nodeName, 1, LENGTH(m.nodeName)) and mh.nodeName like '%.%' and m.nodeName not like '%.%'
